snippet: Basic freedoms of expression and association are on the decline around the world, the United States said Friday in a report that warned of worsening conditions for opposition groups and human rights activists....

headline.main: FIFA Chief 'Confident' of Video Officials at World Cup
headline.print_headline: FIFA Chief 'Confident' of Video Officials at World Cup

lead_paragraph: Basic freedoms of expression and association are on the decline around the world, the United States said Friday in a report that warned of worsening conditions for opposition groups and human rights activists.
